content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Maria Mamani from Bolivia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: Hello Maria, thank you for considering my apartment as a potential rental option. I would be happy to discuss the rental price with you. May I ask how long you plan on renting the apartment for?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I want to rent the apartment for 6 months.

Hello Mister Heine, my name is Maria Mamani from Bolivia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: Thank you for letting me know, Maria. Based on the size of the apartment and the duration of the rental, I would be looking for a rental price of €1,200 per month. I believe this is a fair price for a 25 square meter apartment in this location, and it would allow me to maximize my gains as a landlord. Is this price within your budget?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: Yes, I can accept the price of €1,200 per month. I agree to the price of €1,200 per month.
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: Great, Maria. I am glad to hear that you can accept the rental price of €1,200 per month. Please let me know if you have any additional questions or concerns before we move forward with the rental agreement.
name: Heinrich Heine
